title: Add configurable external website link to the Earn app navigation

requirements.text: Add a configurable external website link (URL + label) to the Earn app UI so users can click from the app to the user’s website.
acceptanceCriteria: A new external link is available in the primary navigation (desktop) and the mobile menu.
The external link opens in a new tab and uses safe link attributes (e.g., rel="noopener noreferrer").
The external website URL and label are configurable in the frontend (e.g., via a single config module and/or Vite env vars such as VITE_WEBSITE_URL and VITE_WEBSITE_LABEL).
If no website URL is configured, the external link is not rendered anywhere (no broken/placeholder link).
All user-facing text for this feature is in English (e.g., default label: "Website").

requirements.text: Add the same configurable external website link to the global footer alongside the existing attribution link(s).
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays a "Website" link only when a valid external URL is configured.
Clicking the footer website link opens the configured URL in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
Footer layout remains responsive and visually consistent with the existing theme.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not add or require any third-party authentication or external backend services.
Keep the backend unchanged (no Motoko/state changes) for this request unless strictly necessary.
nonGoals: Buying/configuring a custom domain, DNS records, or external hosting setup for the user’s website.
Building or embedding the user’s external website inside the app (iframe-based embedding is out of scope).
Changing existing earning plans, deposit/withdrawal flows, referral logic, or admin workflows.
